product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: A. | FIRE PUMP ROOM | FIRE WATER PUMPING SYSTEM
product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of Electrical Motor driven main pump, VERTICAL TURBINE type, capable of deliver 410 M3/HR at 105 MWC. The bowl assembly shall consist of suction bell, impellers, bowl shaft and column. Column depth shall be minimum 4.5 mtr. Pump shall be coupled with TEFC motor of suitable KW with speed of 1450 RPM with all accessories. The quoted rate shall include all fixing parts necessary to couple the pump with motor. Civil foundation like mounting base etc will be client's scope. (FOR HYDRANT SYSTEM)
product_entries.size: capacity: 410 M3/HR, head: 105 MWC, column depth: 4.5 mtr, speed: 1450 RPM
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: drive: electrical motor, coupling: TEFC motor, accessories: all fixing parts necessary to couple the pump with motor, bowl assembly: suction bell, impellers, bowl shaft and column, civil foundation: mounting base (client's scope), application: hydrant system

product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: A. | FIRE PUMP ROOM | FIRE WATER PUMPING SYSTEM
product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of Electrical Motor driven main pump, centrifugal horizontal type, with gland packing capable of deliver 410 M3/HR at 105 MWC. The pump shall be coupled with TEFC motor of suitable KW with speed of 1450 RPM with all accessories and complete set shall mounted on common base frame. The quoted rate shall include fixing of coupling, coupling guard and foudation bolts etc. Civil foundation will be client's scope.(FOR HYDRANT SYSTEM)
product_entries.size: capacity: 410 M3/HR, head: 105 MWC, speed: 1450 RPM
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: drive: electrical motor, coupling: TEFC motor, packing: gland packing, mounting: common base frame, accessories: fixing of coupling, coupling guard, foundation bolts, civil foundation: client's scope, application: hydrant system

product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: A. | FIRE PUMP ROOM | FIRE WATER PUMPING SYSTEM
product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of diesel engine driven standby pump, VERTICAL TURBINE type, capable of deliver 410 M3/HR at 105 MWC. The bowl assembly shall consists of suction bell, impellers, bowl shaft and column. Column depth shall be minimum 4.5 mtr. Pump shall be coupled with diesel engine of suitable HP with speed of 1500 RPM with all accessories. The quoted rate shall include all fixing parts necessary to couple the pump with engine. Civil foundation like mounting base etc will be client's scope.
product_entries.size: capacity: 410 M3/HR, head: 105 MWC, column depth: 4.5 mtr, speed: 1500 RPM
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: drive: diesel engine, coupling: diesel engine, accessories: all fixing parts necessary to couple the pump with engine, bowl assembly: suction bell, impellers, bowl shaft and column, civil foundation: mounting base (client's scope)

product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: A. | FIRE PUMP ROOM | FIRE WATER PUMPING SYSTEM
product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection,testing & commissioning of diesel engine driven stand by pump, centrifugal horizontal type with gland packing and capable  of delivering 410 M3/HR at 105 MWC. The pump shall be coupled to suitable HP of Diesel Engine radiator water cooled type having speed of 1500 RPM with all accessories including diesel engine control panel and complete set shall be mounted on common base frame.Other accessories viz Batteries & battery leads with stand, fuel tank(for 4 hrs operation) with stand and gauge glass, fuel piping with valves etc to be supplied. The quoted rate shall include radiator water cooling piping(if required), coupling guard and other standard accessories, RCC foundation(as recommended by manufacturer) and foundation bolts, etc, complete ( civil foundation shall be client's scope).
product_entries.size: capacity: 410 M3/HR, head: 105 MWC, speed: 1500 RPM, fuel tank capacity: for 4 hrs operation
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: drive: diesel engine, cooling: radiator water cooled, control panel: diesel engine control panel, mounting: common base frame, accessories: batteries & battery leads with stand, fuel tank with stand and gauge glass, fuel piping with valves, radiator water cooling piping, coupling guard, RCC foundation (as recommended by manufacturer), foundation bolts, packing: gland packing, civil foundation: client's scope

product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: A. | FIRE PUMP ROOM | FIRE WATER PUMPING SYSTEM
product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of electric motor driven Jockey Pump,VERTICAL TURBINE type capable to deliver 25 M3/HR at 105 MWC.

product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: A. | FIRE PUMP ROOM | FIRE WATER PUMPING SYSTEM
product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of electric motor driven Jockey Pump,centrifugal horizontal type capable to deliver 25 M3/HR at 105 MWC. The pump shall coupled to TEFC motor of suitable KW with speed of 2900 RPM with all accessories mounted on common base frame.
product_entries.size: capacity: 25 M3/HR, head: 105 MWC, speed: 2900 RPM
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: drive: electric motor, coupling: TEFC motor, mounting: common base frame, accessories: all accessories

product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: A. | FIRE PUMP ROOM | FIRE WATER PUMPING SYSTEM
product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of compartmentalised common control panel for above pumps  as per technical specification attached with this tender document. All components shall be housed in a common cubicals made of 16 swg. M.S. sheet with required stiffners(if required). The panel shall be powder coated of approved colour both inside and out side. The panel shall have both bottom and top cable entry provisions and panel shall be mounted on pedestal of 300mm height.
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: application: for above pumps, construction: 16 swg ms(mild steel) sheet, finish: powder coated (approved colour, inside and outside), cable entry: bottom and top, mounting: pedestal, components: housed in common cubicals, stiffners: as required

product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: A. | FIRE PUMP ROOM | FIRE WATER PUMPING SYSTEM
product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, laying, testing & commissioning of FRLS, PVC outer sheath, steel armoured, aluminium / copper conductor, 1100 Volt Grade power cables with gland etc for above pumps. The cable shall be laid in tray / hume pipe / in trenches / on walls / floors etc as required. Cables laid out doors shall include the price of earth escavation providing brick and sand protection, refilling and compacting the earth.
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: type: FRLS(fire retardant low smoke), sheath: PVC outer sheath, armouring: steel armoured, conductor: aluminium or copper, voltage: 1100 Volt Grade, accessories: gland, laying: tray, hume pipe, trenches, walls, floors, outdoor laying: earth excavation, brick and sand protection, refilling, compacting

product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: A. | FIRE PUMP ROOM | FIRE WATER PUMPING SYSTEM
product_entries.full_product_description: GI earthing strips of 50mm x 6mm thick, strips shall run on floor / ceiling / walls, from pump to control panel with necessary accessories as required.
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: material: gi(galvanized iron), application: from pump to control panel, accessories: necessary accessories as required, installation: floor, ceiling, walls

product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: A. | FIRE PUMP ROOM | FIRE WATER PUMPING SYSTEM
product_entries.full_product_description: 25 Sq.mm single core multistrand copper cable shall be run on floor / ceiling / walls, from the nearest earth bar to the pump control panel with necessary accessories as required.
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: core: single, type: multistrand, material: copper, application: from nearest earth bar to pump control panel, installation: floor, ceiling, walls, accessories: necessary accessories as required

product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: A. | FIRE PUMP ROOM | FIRE WATER PUMPING SYSTEM
product_entries.full_product_description: Supply and installation of pressure gauge, 1/2 inch bottom entry, of suitable range with ball valves and other accessories.
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: range: suitable range, accessories: ball valves and other accessories

product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: A. | FIRE PUMP ROOM | FIRE WATER PUMPING SYSTEM
product_entries.full_product_description: Supply and installation of Pressure switches, SPDT type, of suitable range for pump sets with ball valves and other accessories.
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: type: SPDT(single pole double throw), range: suitable range, application: for pump sets, accessories: ball valves and other accessories

original_rows.1: Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of Electrical Motor driven main pump, VERTICAL TURBINE type, capable of deliver 410 M3/HR at 105 MWC. The bowl assembly shall consist of suction bell, impellers, bowl shaft and column. Column depth shall be minimum 4.5 mtr. Pump shall be coupled with TEFC motor of suitable KW with speed of 1450 RPM with all accessories. The quoted rate shall include all fixing parts necessary to couple the pump with motor. Civil foundation like mounting base etc will be client's scope.                                        (FOR HYDRANT SYSTEM)

Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of Electrical Motor driven main pump, centrifugal horizontal type, with gland packing capable of deliver 410 M3/HR at 105 MWC. The pump shall be coupled with TEFC motor of suitable KW with speed of 1450 RPM with all accessories and complete set shall mounted on common base frame. The quoted rate shall include fixing of coupling, coupling guard and foudation bolts etc. Civil foundation will be client's scope.(FOR HYDRANT SYSTEM)

Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of Electrical Motor driven main pump, VERTICAL TURBINE type, capable of deliver 410 M3/HR at 105 MWC. The bowl assembly shall consists of suction bell, impellers, bowl shaft and column. Column depth shall be minimum 4.5 mtr. Pump shall be coupled with TEFC motor of suitable KW with speed of 1450 RPM with all accessories. The quoted rate shall include all fixing parts necessary to couple the pump with motor. Civil foundation like mounting base etc will be client's scope.                                        (FOR SPRINKLER SYSTEM)

Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of Electrical Motor driven main pump, centrifugal horizontal type, with gland packing capable of deliver 410 M3/HR at 105 MWC. The pump shall be coupled with TEFC motor of suitable KW with speed of 1450 RPM with all accessories and complete set shall mounted on common base frame. The quoted rate shall include fixing of coupling, coupling guard and foudation bolts etc. Civil foundation will be client's scope.(FOR SPRINKLER SYSTEM)

Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of diesel engine driven standby pump, VERTICAL TURBINE type, capable of deliver 410 M3/HR at 105 MWC. The bowl assembly shall consists of suction bell, impellers, bowl shaft and column. Column depth shall be minimum 4.5 mtr. Pump shall be coupled with diesel engine of suitable HP with speed of 1500 RPM with all accessories. The quoted rate shall include all fixing parts necessary to couple the pump with engine. Civil foundation like mounting base etc will be client's scope.

Supply, erection,testing & commissioning of diesel engine driven stand by pump, centrifugal horizontal type with gland packing and capable  of delivering 410 M3/HR at 105 MWC. The pump shall be coupled to suitable HP of Diesel Engine radiator water cooled type having speed of 1500 RPM with all accessories including diesel engine control panel and complete set shall be mounted on common base frame.Other accessories viz Batteries & battery leads with stand, fuel tank(for 4 hrs operation) with stand and gauge glass, fuel piping with valves etc to be supplied. The quoted rate shall include radiator water cooling piping(if required), coupling guard and other standard accessories, RCC foundation(as recommended by manufacturer) and foundation bolts, etc, complete ( civil foundation shall be client's scope).
Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of electric motor driven Jockey Pump,VERTICAL TURBINE type capable to deliver 25 M3/HR at 105 MWC.

Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of electric motor driven Jockey Pump,centrifugal horizontal type capable to deliver 25 M3/HR at 105 MWC. The pump shall coupled to TEFC motor of suitable KW with speed of 2900 RPM with all accessories mounted on common base frame.

Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of compartmentalised common control panel for above pumps  as per technical specification attached with this tender document. All components shall be housed in a common cubicals made of 16 swg. M.S. sheet with required stiffners(if required). The panel shall be powder coated of approved colour both inside and out side. The panel shall have both bottom and top cable entry provisions and panel shall be mounted on pedestal of 300mm height.

Supply, laying, testing & commissioning of FRLS, PVC outer sheath, steel armoured, aluminium / copper conductor, 1100 Volt Grade power cables with gland etc for above pumps. The cable shall be laid in tray / hume pipe / in trenches / on walls / floors etc as required. Cables laid out doors shall include the price of earth escavation providing brick and sand protection, refilling and compacting the earth.
GI earthing strips of 50mm x 6mm thick, strips shall run on floor / ceiling / walls, from pump to control panel with necessary accessories as required.
25 Sq.mm single core multistrand copper cable shall be run on floor / ceiling / walls, from the nearest earth bar to the pump control panel with necessary accessories as required.
Supply and installation of pressure gauge, 1/2 inch bottom entry, of suitable range with ball valves and other accessories.
Supply and installation of Pressure switches, SPDT type, of suitable range for pump sets with ball valves and other accessories.

Supply and installation of double flanged vertical air vessel fabricated from M.S. Plate with dished ends (M.S. plate to be of required thickness to sustain the indicated test pressure), one standard pressure tight manhole, painted inside with bitumastic or anti-corrosive paint and outside with one coast of primer and two coats of synthetic enamel paint complete with approved quality of pressure switches, pressure gauge and all other required accessories to operate commonly main/sprinkler/diesel fire pump & jockey pump at drop of pressure, automatically at required pressure setting (Air vessel, pressure switch, pressure gauge, air release valve, piping and accessories to suit the pressure requirement of individual pressure zone)
